18. How do you maintain your cheerful and outgoing personality in stressful situations?
19. What is it about flirtatious situations that makes you feel uncomfortable?
20. How do you handle conflicts among your loved ones?

22. How do your significant other support your passion for art?
23. What role does your partner play in your artistic process?
24. How do you unwind after a long day of painting?

26. What's your favourite medium to work with and why?
27. How has your art evolved over the years?

29. Can you share your favourite artistic achievement?

31. How has being an artist impacted your worldview?

34. How do you decide the price of your artwork?

36. How do you maintain your motivation during challenging times?

39. What role does art play in your everyday life?

42. What does a typical day look like for you?
43. How do you keep yourself updated with the latest trends in art?
